name: Endless Dead (itch)
description:
ControlsW, A, S, DMoves PlayerLeft MouseShootRight MousePan CameraEInteractQDrop Items

Endless Dead is a action shooter game where you try to survive as long as possible in a forest with enemies around every corner, you can upgrade your Camp with scrap you find through out the world, find or buy weapons to slash through the enemies.

This was made by two Developers for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 in  7 days.
